title: guitar ghost jam sesh

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, go in general chat and ping a dead player to join vc. If you can arrange a meeting in vc before the next day begins, you gain 1 point. During this vc meeting you have to play guitar. (or if you don't have a guitar do something else ig. maybe keep in the spirit of music.) The host doesn't have to verify this btw you can pretty much do whatever in vc, but just have a screenshot that you were there

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__ - If part of the Daily Streak Faction, if they join your jam, you revive them as part of your team.

desc:
Post 4777
*i was procrastinating doing homework by playing guitar and now im procrastinating playing guitar by making my daily streak role*
